name: Repton Thru Time
overview: Repton Thru Time is the final of three standalone expansion packs for Repton 3. It includes 40 new levels made in the map editor that was included with the original game. This time Repton is travelling through time and visits a number of historical places. There are five sets of levels each with eight levels. Each set represents an age or historical place and are as follows: Prehistoric times Ancient Egypt Victorian times Now It was written by Matthew Atkinson and developed by Impact Posters. It was published by Superior Software for the BBC Microcomputer and Acorn Electron in 1988. It contains the Repton 3 main program, the Repton 3 map editor and the themed screen pack.
